languages.text: "Ты из Несущих Слово — проклятого легиона, предавшего Империум".

traits.locale_text: "Ты из Несущих Слово — проклятого легиона, предавшего Империум".

languages.text: "You are one of the Word Bearers — the cursed Legion that betrayed the Imperium."
languages.original_text: "Ты из Несущих Слово — проклятого легиона, предавшего Империум".

languages.text: «Eres uno de los Portadores de la Palabra, una legión maldita que traicionó al Imperium».
languages.original_text: "You are one of the Word Bearers — the cursed Legion that betrayed the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: «Eres uno de los Portadores de la Palabra, una legión maldita que traicionó al Imperium».

languages.text: 「お前は帝国を裏切った忌々しい兵団、ワードベアラーの一員だ」
languages.original_text: "You are one of the Word Bearers — the cursed Legion that betrayed the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は帝国を裏切った忌々しい兵団、ワードベアラーの一員だ」

languages.text: “你是怀言者的一员。你的军团受到了诅咒，背叛了帝国。”
languages.original_text: "You are one of the Word Bearers — the cursed Legion that betrayed the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “你是怀言者的一员。你的军团受到了诅咒，背叛了帝国。”

languages.text: « Vous faites partie de la légion maudite des Word Bearers, qui a trahi l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "You are one of the Word Bearers — the cursed Legion that betrayed the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: « Vous faites partie de la légion maudite des Word Bearers, qui a trahi l'Imperium. »

languages.text: "Ihr seid Mitglied der Word Bearers — einer verfluchten Legion, die das Imperium verraten hat."
languages.original_text: "You are one of the Word Bearers — the cursed Legion that betrayed the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid Mitglied der Word Bearers — einer verfluchten Legion, die das Imperium verraten hat."

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'a ihanet eden rezil Lejyon'a, Vahyedenler'e mensupsun."
languages.original_text: "You are one of the Word Bearers — the cursed Legion that betrayed the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “Vahyedenlerdensin. İmparatorluk’a ihanet eden o rezil lejyonun bir üyesisin.”
